defs: = ಮರ್ದುಮೀ.
any of the qualities generally regarded as those that a man should have, as virilty; strength, bravery, resoluteness, etc.; manliness.
a big, cylindrical percussion instrument consisting of a hollow cylinder or hemisphere with a membrane stretched tightly over both the ends, played by beating with the hands, sticks, etc.
he who moves only during night or also is capable of moving during night (without the aid of light); a demon.
the condition of somewhat dark; lack of sufficient light; dimness.
the condition of the sensibility being diminished or lessened greatly, as caused by loss of sleep or from the use of a narcotic, etc.; stupour.
a kind of gambling.
(fig.) a senseless, idiotic fellow; a stupid.
the quality of being stupid, foolish; senselessness; stupidity; foolishness.
the condition or quality of being ignorant; lack of knowledge; ignorance.
dimness of light; lack of sufficient light.
a son of one's son or daughter; a grandson.
any vital, sensitive or vulnerable spot or part of the body.
any of the places or parts where two bones are joined, so that they can move; a joint.
the mind or heart as the seat for inner feelings.
something hidden or that requires to be kept concealed; a secret or mystery.
the hidden meaning or interior motive.
a man appointed to execute something in a secret or clandestine manner.
to cause to suffer mentally (as by raking up delicate, embarrassing issues).
a blow delivered on a vulnerable or vital part of the body.
to hurt emotionally by raking unpleasant, embarrassing facts up.
wounding the vitals; hitting at or on a vulnerbale part of the body.
= ಮರ್ಮಘಾತ.
he who strikes on a vulnerable or vital part of another's body.
a man who hurts another emotionally by raking unpleasant, embarrassing facts up.
= ಮರ್ಮಘಾತಕ - 3 & 4.
one who has the capacity to understand the secret or mystery (behind something); an exceedingly clver man.
he who knows the weak vulnerable points of another (esp. of an enemy).
the act or process of understanding the secret or mystery (behind something).
understanding or capable of understanding the secret or mystery (behind something).
hitting at the vital parts, vulnerable spots, etc.
causing much grief or mental anguish.
a man or something that causes much grief or mental anguish.
he who can understand the secret, mystery of something or vulnerability of another (esp. of a rival or enemy).
the act of understanding the secret, mystery of something or weakness, vulnerability of another, etc.
the act of hitting at the vital parts, vulnerable spots, etc.
a causing of much grief or mental anguish to another.
a woman or something that causes much grief or mental anguish.
she who can understand the secret, mystery of something or vulnerability of another (esp. of a rival or enemy).
= ಮರ್ಮಭೇದಕ1.
= ಮರ್ಮಭೇದಕ2.
a sound produced by shaking leaves (as by a current of air) or by walking on dry leaves.
to make a sound by shaking leaves or by walking on dry leaves.
any infectious venereal disease.
touching the vital or vulnerable parts; very cutting or stinging; highly sarcastic.
a daughter of one's son or daughter; a grand-daughter.
sharp pain inflicted by stinging or pungent remark, accusation, etc.
a man inflicted so.
a man who tends to conceal his thoughts, feelings, affairs, plants, etc. from others; a secretive man.
a man who knows or who can understand another's plan, plot, etc.
a blow delivered on a vulnerable or vital part of the body.
to hurt emotionally by raking unpleasant, embarrassing facts up.
the act or process of understanding the secret or mystery (behind something).
= ಮರ್ಮೋದ್ಘಾಟನ.
conforming to approved social standards; respectable.
not immodest; not obscene; chaste.
a man whose conduct conforms to approved social standards; a respectable man.
a man who is not immodest.
a woman whose conduct conforms to approved social standards; a respectable woman.
a woman who is not immodest.
= ಮರ್ಯಾದಸ್ತ.
= ಮರ್ಯಾದಸ್ತ.
= ಮರ್ಯಾದಸ್ತೆ.
limited by; having definite boundary or boundaries.
the boundary or frontier of a state, nation, etc.
a set date or duration of time as for payment, termination of tenancy, etc.
the land along a waterbody, that limits water from flowing over in normal conditions; a shore; a bank.
reverential regard; respect extended to.
the respect that one deserves.
a habitual practice; the usual way of acting in given circumstances; a custom.
a way, manner in which something done or is to be done.
certainly; without doubt.
to make something dim or to make something look dim.
= ಮರ್ಬು.
the act, quality, tendency or an instance of forbearing, toleratingor enduring; toleration; forbearance; endurance.
a man who habitually endures, forbears or tolerates (something).
a thin, soft muslin.
(used in composition only) combining form related through the remarriage of a parent.
the tree Flacourtia jongamans ( = F. cataphracta) of Flacourtiaceae family.
dirt; filth; dust; impurity.
any of the bodily excretions as faeces, sweat, phlegm, etc.
the red or orange coating that forms on the surface of iron when exposed to air and moisture; rust.
an offence against god; any act regarded as such a transgression, esp. a willful or deliberate violation of some religious or moral principle; a sin.
any flaw, defect or shortcoming; a blemish.
that which is unfit for religious purpose.
a hole or cavity in a diamond, considered as a defect.
any of the three humours of the body, wind, bile or phlegm.
that which corrupts the soul and keep in ignorance.
a boy or man as related to a younger person only one of whose parents is common.
= ಮಲಗಿಸು.
= ಮಲಗು1.
= ಮಲಗು2.
= ಮಲಗು2.
a condition in which the feces are dry and hardened and evacuation is difficult and infrequent; constipation.
the plant Hibiscus canescens of Malvaceae family.
to shake (something, continuously or repeatedly).
to move unsteadily.
to be tempted (esp. to do wrong) easily; to become frail.
the fact of being interwoven or connected closely or intricately; a tangle.
a knob in a thread, cord, rope, etc. formed by passing one free end through a loop and drawing it tight; a knot.
an ornament made by interweaving some strips, splits, etc.
a kind of head ornament.
a kind of necklace.
a string of decorative beads suspended by the ends to hang as a curve across the doorway.
(dance.) a particular posture.
a seizing and holding or being seized and held fast; secure grasp; firm hold.

ಮಲಕಿನ ಕೋಲು malakina kōlu a particular variety of a folk-dance performed by a group of people, in which short sticks are stuck rythmically in harmony to the song sung, moving within themselves, as the threads in a woven fabric; a kind of morris-dance.
ಮಲಕು ಬೀಳು malaku bīḷu to be connected closely or intricately with; to be well blended; ಮಲಕಿನ ತೆನೆ malakina tene the top portion of a fortification, projecting upwards, having interwoven structure.
to become full of knots or interwoven intricately.
the opening at the lower end of the alimentary canal through which the solid refuse of digestion is excreted; the anux.
the tree Randia candolleana of Ruybiaceae family.
= ಮಲಕಟ್ಟು.
a kind of land.
to cause to lie down (as on a bed, mat, sofa, etc.).
to lean on another (for support).
to destroy; to demolish; to spoil completely.
to lean on (either while sitting or standing): 2) to lie oneself down (as on a bed, mat, sofa, etc.).
to be in or to go to, the state of sleep.
to have sexual intercourse; to copulate.
to take (another person) into one's arms and press to the bosom, from love, affection or expressing one's joy.
to become actionless, motionless or stationary.
to be or continue to be ignorant; to lack or to continue to be lacking knowledge.
to hang down unevenly or losely; to sag.
to be in bed from sickness; to be sick.
ಮಲಗುವ ಮನೆ malaguva mane a room where a person normally sleeps; a bed-room.
a long, round cushion or pillow to lean on, while sitting; a bolster.
a kind of fish; an eel.
a place or room where one normally sleeps.
= ಮಲಗು2.
full of filth, dirt; grossly dirty.
a totally dirty man.
a totally dirty woman.
a girl or woman as related to a person only one of whose parents is common.
the husband of one's mother by a later marriage; a step-father.
a boy or man as related to an elder person only one of whose parents is common.
= ಮಲತಾಯಿ.
the wife of one's father by a later marriage; a step-mother; ಮಲತಾಯಿ ಧೋರಣೆ malatāyi dhōraṇe (fig.) a biased treatment meted out.
(pl.) the three excretions from the body, sweat, urine and faeces.
a totally dirty person.
= ಮಲತಾಯಿ.
= ಮಲತಾಯಿ.
= ಮಲಗ್ರ್ರಸ್ತ2.

a bathing (of a bride or bridegroom) in water mixed with turmeric powder.
wet, soft earth or earthy matter, as on the ground after rain, at the bottom of a pond or along the banks of a river; mire; mud.
a condition in which the faeces are dry and hardened and evacuation is difficult and infrequent; constipation.
= ಮಲಬದ್ಧತೆ.
the discomfort, pain caused by holding the faeces from being excreted.
the act or an instance of passing the faeces.
the plant Indigofera endecaphylla of Popilionaceae family.
a boy or man who one's husband or wife had by another marriage; a step son.
a girl or woman who one's husband or wife had by another marriage; a step daughter.
= ಮಲಮಲನೆ.
= ಮಲಮಲ್ಲು.
= ಮಲಮಲನೆ.
(used to modify the verb ಮರುಗು(ಮಱುಗು) to grieve, in intrans. mode) excessively.

a thin, soft muslin.
to grieve (oneself) excessively.
the plant Xanthophylium flavesceens of Polygalaceae family (?).
the thirteenth, intercalary, lunary month inserted in the Lunar calendar after every thirty lunar months which is religiously considered as inauspicious.
the creeper Ventilago maderaspatana of Rhamnaceae family.
a mountain (in gen.).
name of a range of mountains in South India, known for rich growth of sandalwood trees.
the region surrounding this range.
the tree Santalum album ( = Sirium myrtifolium) of Santalaceae family.
its hard, light-coloured, close-grained, sweet-smelling wood.
the paste made by powder of this wood.
the wind blowing from the Malaya range of mountains, carrying the sweet smell of sandalwood.
(mus.) in Karnāṭaka system, a mode derived from the main mode Cakravāka.
= ಮಲಯಜ.
= ಮಲಯ - 2.

another plant Sophora interrupta of the same family.
the plant Cassia sophera of Caesalpiniaceae family; senna sophera.
the state of Kerala, in South India, having Tiruvananthapuram as its capital.
the official language of this state, one of the four prominent Dravadian languages.
a man who is a native of this state.
to come or go back.
to turn oneself (as to see again).
3 to be attracted, fascinated, charmed by.
to withdraw oneself in the face of opposition or from a dangerous or unpleasant 5ituation; to retreat.
to be hanging loosely.
to turn oneself on one's own axis or around a point; to revolve.

= ಮಲರು1.

not stained by dirt, dust, filth, etc.; unsoiled; clean.
not stained by sin, moral blimish or dishonour; pure; upright.
a man not stained by sin, moral blimish, dishonour; a man of immaculate conduct.
anything that clean, pure, blemishless.
to cause (a flower) to blow up, expand.
(a bud of a flower) to expand; to blow up.
to be filled with high spirits, enthusiasm, optimism, etc.; to be elated.
a reproductiveof angiosperm plants having showy or colourful petals; a flower.

a recurrent disorder of the nervous system, characterised either by mild, episodic loss of attention or sleepiness or by severe convulsions with loss of consciousness, accompanied by convulsions, physical dysfunction, etc.; epilepsy.

to cause to go back.
to give back (what was taken earlier).
to turn an object as to face a different direction.
to cause to travel in a circle or orbit; to revolve.
to heat (a liquid) as to form tiny bubbles with a low, murmuring sound.
(myth.) Manmatha, the Love-God, whose bow is made of flowers.

an infectious disease, usu. intermittent or remittent, characterised by attacks of severe chills, fever, and sweating caused by a parasitic protozoan, which is transferred to the human bloodstream by a mosquito of the genus Anopheles and which occupies and destroys red blood cells.

a Jaina saint, the son of first Thirthankara named Adinatha, who fought against and defeated his ambitious brother but got disillusioned with the futility of the worldly life, stood meditating for a year and got enlightened.
